duck: Ghost - In traditional belief and fiction, a ghost is the soul or spirit of a dead person or animal that can appear, in visible form or other manifestation, to the living.
Apparitional experience - In psychology and parapsychology, an apparitional experience is an anomalous, quasi-perceptual experience.
phantasm definition: a product of fantasy.
Hallucination - A hallucination, in the broadest sense of the word, is a perception in the absence of a stimulus.

wiki.text:
